001package net.tvburger.jdl.datasets;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.cnn.ConvolutionalShape;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
006
007import java.io.IOException;
008import java.util.Arrays;
009
010public final class MnistDataSets {
011
012    private MnistDataSets() {
013    }
014
015    public static ConvolutionalShape digitAsShape(Array<Float> features) throws IOException {
016        return new ConvolutionalShape(28, 28, ConvolutionalShape.DEFAULT_CHANNELS, ConvolutionalShape.DEFAULT_INDEX, features);
017    }
018
019    public static DataSet<Float> loadDigits() throws IOException {
020        MnistReader.MnistData mnistData = MnistReader.readImagesLabels(
021                "mnist/train-images.idx3-ubyte",
022                "mnist/train-labels.idx1-ubyte");
023        DataSet.Sample<Float>[] samples = new DataSet.Sample[mnistData.images.size()];
024        for (int i = 0; i < samples.length; i++) {
025            samples[i] = DataSet.Sample.of(
026                    imageToFloatFeatures(mnistData.images.get(i)),
027                    labelToFloatOutputs(mnistData.labels[i]));
028        }
029        return DataSet.of(samples);
030    }
031
032    private static Array<Float> imageToFloatFeatures(int[] imagePixels) {
033        Float[] features = new Float[imagePixels.length];
034        for (int i = 0; i < imagePixels.length; i++) {
035            features[i] = imagePixels[i] / 255.0f;
036        }
037        return Array.of(features);
038    }
039
040    private static Array<Float> labelToFloatOutputs(byte label) {
041        Float[] outputs = new Float[10];
042        Arrays.fill(outputs, 0.0f);
043        outputs[label] = 1.0f;
044        return Array.of(outputs);
045    }
046
047}
